summary.p: Aeskulap is a medical image viewer. It is able to load a series of special images stored in the DICOM format for review.

description.p: Supports compressed (lossless, lossy), uncompressed and multiframe DICOM images, C-Find support (query archive nodes), C-Move (query / retrieve) support, Proper display support for Rescale / Intercept tags. Handles color images.
